long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Geminify allows you to have AI at your fingertips with every right click. Select a word or phrase you don't understand, ask Gemini what it means or something else on your mind, and have an in-depth answer in seconds! Lightweight, easy to use, and reliable, Geminify is something you need for streamlined internet productivity and as a helpful assistant by your side.
